Articles.Content:
I watched once whole series from the Earth to The Moon the first episode was about Mercury and Gemini.

On this episode was shown the Freedom 7 launch, during landing Alan Shepard said "guidance is 70% auto 90% manual" what that mean???

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fP5HA8Vs2Vk

05:35

The line is, "I've got seven zero percent auto, nine zero percent manual."

Shepard is referring to the peroxide tanks for the attitude control system. The Mercury capsule had separate tanks for automatic and manual control.

http://airandspace.si.edu/collections/artifact.cfm?object=nasm_A19721138000
